ygData.subject: Re: the Tangrin
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never seen it but the only reference I can find out about Tangrin is something major. Epic weapon... The sands of the Mystic are dropped by
ygData.messageBody:
I've never seen it but the only reference I can
find out about Tangrin is something major. Epic
weapon...<br><br>"The sands of the Mystic are dropped by Tangrin who
spawns in the Field of Bone [3500, 2800]. Combine all
four items into the Enchanter's Bag to obtain the Sack
for Polzin. Hand this to him and you will receive the
Fouth Piece of Staff."<br><br>This is like I said
earlier this post... in reference to the Enchanter Epic
Weapon Quest. It's a BIG gorrilla though... so probably
what you're looking for. And The Tangrin is level
54... so hope you're up there in level.
Grin.<br><br>shooman out
